title: Does anyone have a fix for the greyed out APN with the wrong settings on Pixel?
content: Trying to correct Change an incorrect value on APN.  APN is inaccessible, greyed out.  I tried a new APN but the phone reverts to the old as it is probably the default.  I am on three. I get endless text from them telling me to correct the APN.  Probably not getting picture messaging now.
